revised_title: Announcements and Publications in the Royal Society of London
tldr: This issue of the Proceedings of the Royal Society of London announces various publications and research findings in diverse scientific fields, including chemistry, astronomy, biology, medicine, physics, mathematics, and social sciences. Contributors include notable figures such as Samuel Haughton, Samuel Vest, W. De W. Abney, G. R. Darwin, Charles E. Beevor, and Victor Horsley. The Society will reconvene on November 18th.
